name: Wormmings
description:
A few words about the game:

This is a game of against expectations, which it is not about survival and building but is about complete destruction and death

Try to destroy all of frendly cretures to win a game ... if you can !!!

Free licence  elements use to create game:

  • https://www.gameart2d.com/free-graveyard-platformer-tileset.html - assets board,
  • http://dig.ccmixter.org/free - music background (Quarkstar_-_solar_fractal_1.mp3),
  • https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/dark-cave-landscape_2722247.htm#page=1&query... - background wallper,
  • https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-2d-knight-sprite-sheets - hero and figures,
  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/voiceover-pack-fighter - sounds speakers,
  • https://doomcaster.itch.io/button-assets - menu (buttons),
  • https://v-ktor.itch.io/24x24-rpg-items - icons in buttons,
  • https://bayat.itch.io/platform-game-assets - icons in buttons II,
  • https://codemanu.itch.io/pixelart-effect-pack - end gate - portal, 
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565 - start portal assets 

Creators and  designers:

PNI & DRU & PWS
